dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2745564R] Content Theft of FirefoxFacts.com

To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

claim.

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2007 6:07 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2745564R] Content Theft of FirefoxFacts.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Content Theft of FirefoxFacts.com
Added by system at Saturday, Jan 27 2007 08:40 pm
X-MailFrom: mitch@mitchkeeler.com
X-RcptTo: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [172.16.220.10] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat Jan 27 20:40:03 2007
Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by
DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Sat, 27 Jan 2007 20:27:27 -0600
Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by
Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Sat, 27 Jan 2007 20:26:49 -0600
X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1169951203-30301-4-0
X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi
X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist:  abuse@ev1servers.net
Received: from web82103.mail.mud.yahoo.com (web82103.mail.mud.yahoo.com
[209.191.84.216])  by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with SMTP id
1D6034EB5F  for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Sat, 27 Jan 2007 20:26:49 -0600
(CST)
Received: (qmail 79183 invoked by uid 60001); 28 Jan 2007 02:26:33 -0000
Message-ID: <20070128022633.79181.qmail@web82103.mail.mud.yahoo.com>
Received: from [69.154.71.214] by web82103.mail.mud.yahoo.com via HTTP;
Sat, 27 Jan 2007 18:26:33 PST
Date: Sat, 27 Jan 2007 18:26:33 -0800 (PST)
From: Mitch Keeler <mitch@mitchkeeler.com>
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Content Theft of FirefoxFacts.com
Subject: Content Theft of FirefoxFacts.com
To: abuse@ev1servers.net
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of
TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
Return-Path: mitch@mitchkeeler.com
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Jan 2007 02:26:49.0470 (UTC)
FILETIME=[C3B1B1E0:01C74283] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Hello, 
 
 
 
I am Mitch Keeler, of the Web Hosting Show (www.webhostingshow.com) and
I wanted to write to you and complain about a customer of yours.  
Actually you host the Web host that hosts this Web site.  (I really hope
that makes sense).  The Web host in question is ProNetSpace.com.  The
folks stealing my content are at Firefoxplus.com.  Firefoxplus.com has
been stealing my content left and right from FirefoxFacts.com. I want to
know what you can do to shut them down for stealing and reposting my
intellectual property.  I have contacted the offender, the offender's
Web host and you thus far to hopefully get a resolution from one of you
soon.  Thank you for your time and hopefully we can get this resolved as
soon as possible.  
Thanks! 
  
  
Mitch Keeler - http://www.mitchkeeler.com
